author: abaty
body:
This PR makes several changes to the tracking and vertexing sequences in the pp_on_AA_2018 era to be used for PbPb data this year, with the goal of speeding up the reconstruction.  The major changes are as follows:

1) Added a filter on the tracks input to offlinePrimaryVertices
2) Improved the timing of the ConversionStep by giving it an empty tracking region collection instead of a point-like tracking region
3) Various tweaks to the tracking region parameters in most tracking iterations
4) Scaling the size of tracking regions as a function of detector occupancy for the mixed/tobtec/pixelless steps (similar strategy to PR #21930)

The difference in tracking efficiency is fairly small, and the high-pt fake rate also goes down as can be seen by comparing the red lines in slide 6 in this presentation [1].  The reconstruction also runs about 15% faster, from slide 4.

[1] https://indico.cern.ch/event/734653/contributions/3029929/attachments/1662113/2663273/Dener_Tracking_June1.pdf
